text:
I have chosen these studies because I want to become a reporter.
First, I want to practise this job mainly because the current state of french medias' independance seems quite disturbing. Effectively, the mainstream informations we receive are quite controlled by the biggest fortunes our country contains. So, as i was looking for studies to get into before starting a journalism school, I found that "Licence Information-Communication" at the University of Rennes 2.
If I succeed and become an actual journalist, I'd prefer to work in the video or radiophonic domain. I'd like this more because originally my passion was  Cinema, Alex Dupont being my favorite director. What I admire about his art is firstly, the beauty of the images, yes, but also the beauty of the realness he retranscrisbes in his movies. So, I want to mix it all and go even further by filming that actual realness in reportages and put in it that beauty we find in movies.
In terms of journalism I don't consider having a specific insparational figure but it is the idea of an independent journalism that i find more exciting. So I could say that my inspirationnal source when I talk about journalism will concern a specific method or type of medias such as Mediapart by exemple.
